DOC.detailed_description: The investigator propose randomize overweight obese , African American postpartum WIC participant ( n=300 ) either usual care ( UC ) community-based obesity treatment ( PP ) arm . Recruitment occur 6 Philadelphia Women Infants Children 's ( WIC ) clinic site early postpartum period ( ≤ 6 month birth ) . Once enrol , participant complete survey baseline assessment weight , waist circumference , blood pressure , height The Center Obesity Research Education ( CORE ) . Participants also fast blood sample take . Study staff administer number questionnaire assess demographic , psychosocial factor , contextual factor , behavioral target via questionnaire prior randomization . Participants randomize 12-month postpartum weight loss intervention ( PP ) usual care ( UC ) . Additional assessment conduct 6 12 month post baseline . The PP arm include expand obesogenic behavior change goal , tailor skill train material , interactive self-monitoring text message , video testimonial , interpersonal counsel support health coach call Facebook . Data analyze use intent-to-treat ( ITT ) approach subject analyze accord treatment assignment randomization , regardless level engagement . The primary outcome weight loss 12 month . If successful , expect result could provide sustainable , low-cost , postpartum weight loss intervention model widespread dissemination reduce disparity obesity cardiometabolic comorbidities .
